collect_stats module¶

Collect the statistics for each variable in the dataset.

datareport.collect_stats.get_a_sample(df: pandas.core.frame.DataFrame, sample_size: int = -1, random_state: int = 0, file: str = None, line_ending: str = '\n') → pandas.core.frame.DataFrame¶

Provide the original dataset or a random sample of it.

Parameters

  • line_ending –

  • file –

  • df – the target dataset

  • sample_size – Number of rows to sample from the target dataframe

  • random_state – Random seed for the row sampler

Returns

the original dataset or a sample of it

datareport.collect_stats.get_var_summary(df: pandas.core.frame.DataFrame, sample_size: int = -1, random_state: int = 0) → pandas.core.frame.DataFrame¶

Provide a summary table of data types of the given dataset.

Parameters

  • df – the target dataset

  • sample_size – Number of rows to sample from the target dataframe

  • random_state – Random seed for the row sampler

Returns

a summary table of data types of the given dataset

datareport.collect_stats.get_table_stats(df: pandas.core.frame.DataFrame, var_stats: Dict[str, List[pandas.core.series.Series]]) → Dict[str, int]¶

Extract information from the target dataset.

Parameters

  • df – the target dataset

  • var_stats – statistics from each variable

Returns

a dictionary contains statistics of the target dataset

datareport.collect_stats.get_variable_stats(df: pandas.core.frame.DataFrame) → Dict[str, List[pandas.core.series.Series]]¶

Collect statistics from each variable.

Parameters

df – the target dataset

Returns

a dictionary contains statistics of all variables
